NAME: Name
TITLE: Title
CONFIRMATION_DELETE_THIS_AUTOMATION: Are you sure you want to delete this automation?
CONFIRMATION_DELETE_THIS_NODE: Are you sure you want to delete this node?
AUTOMATION_METADATA_TOOLTIP_TEXT: This automation is located in the file {{source_file}}. It's currently '{{state}}', it's entity id is '{{entityId}}' and it's automation id is '{{id}}'
ERROR_FAILED_TO_SAVE: Failed to save automation "{{aid}}" contents - {{contents}} -- not found in `/config`
ERROR_FAILED_CONNECTION_TO_HA: Failed to connect to websocket, please check that your access token is properly setup.
ERROR_FAILED_CALLING_BC_CONNECTION: Failed to call service because connection is '{{connStatus}}' -- {{connError}}
ISSUE_FAILED_TO_FIND_AUTOMATION_ON_DISK: Failed to find an automation on disk with id = {{id}}
ISSUES_INVALID_STATE: Recived invalid state '{{state}}', this could be because you have a lingering automation that was not cleared by homeassistant, try to reboot HA or manually clear this automation from HA Database.
ISSUES_FIND_AUTOMATION_IN_CONFIG: failed to find this automation in '/config' folder
ISSUES_NO_LOAD_AUTOMATION: homeassistant did not load this automation, try to manually reload automations or restart homeassistant.
AUTOMATION_MANAGER_STATE_CHANGE_FAIL: Failed to toggle automation due to "{{err}}"
AUTOMATION_MANAGER_UPDATE_TAGS_FAIL: Failed updating automation tags due to "{{err}}"
AUTOMATION_MANAGER_DELETE_LIGHT: Failed to delete automation, this may be resolved by a refresh or reboot of Home Assistant
VALIDATION_AUTOMATION_NAME: Name must be at least 1 character long
VALIDATION_MAX_TAG_SELECTION: Can only select up to {{count}} tags
VALIDATION_PLEASE_CORRECT_FILE: Please correct the automation file manually and then continue!
VALIDATION_MISSING_VALUES_FOR_NODE: This node is missing some values
VALIDATION_UNSAVED_WORK_IN_NODE: This node is has some unsaved work
VALIDATION_NOT_ALL_FIELD_FILLED_IN: Some fields have not been properly filled up
CONFIRM_EXIT: Are you sure you want to {{what}}?
MODE_SIGNLE_LABEL: Do not start a new run. Issue a warning.
MODE_SIGNLE_PARALLEL: Start a new, independent run in parallel with previous runs.
MODE_SIGNLE_QUEUED: Start a new run after all previous runs complete. Runs are guaranteed to execute in the order they were queued.
MODE_SIGNLE_RESTART: Start a new run after first stopping previous run.
WARNING_SWITCHING_FROM_NONE_SAVE: Selecting another automation will cause you to lose all work done on this new automation. Please save your work on this automation first.
